chapter.title: Trade Middle-Office Module
chapter.para: The Document Presentations issued by the customers are gathered under the Trade Middle-Office module, so that the bank can reply by acknowledging or rejecting the presentation.

The document presentations initially received appear in the List of Pending Records. Once a bank user has already started to work on the presentation and has either saved it or tried a submission, this record will not appear in this list anymore but instead in the Retrieve Draft or Retrieve Unsigned sub-menu items.
This flow follows the classic reporting mechanism described in the Bank User Guide.

Remark: acknowledgment or rejection is the only action available to the bank to respond to a Document Presentation. Indeed these presentations are always issued by the customers, and there won't be any further amendments or messages issued on a presentation:

listitem.para: The presentations therefore won't appear in the lists of existing records
There is no specific menu for the document presentation, as there is for some other products.
